Database.Title: trees
Database.Issues: working draft of the ER model for storing trees and MSAs

Entity.name: Tree
Entity.Notes: A tree built from a multiple sequence alignment.

Field.name: id
Field.Notes: A unique kbase id for the tree: eg 'kb|tree.XXXX'

Field.name: newick-tree
Field.Notes: leaf nodes provide a key into the AlignmentRowComponent table

Field.name: alignment-id
Field.Notes: maps this tree to an alignment, needed primarily for convenience

Field.name: timestamp
Field.Notes: time of creation (of original tree, or of kbase version?)

Field.name: metadata
Field.Notes: hash for meta-information e.g. name, human readable description, etc

Field.name: method
Field.Notes: tree generation method

Field.name: parameters
Field.Notes: tree generation parameters

Field.name: id
Field.Notes: will be unique kbase id: 'kb|ali.XXXXX'

Field.name: fasta-alignment
Field.Notes: Ref to file storing the alignment (using SHOCK?)

Field.name: n-rows
Field.Notes: number of rows in the alignment

Field.name: metadata
Field.Notes: hash for meta-information e.g. name, human readable description, etc

Field.name: is-concatenation
Field.Notes: boolean value that indicates if leaves map to single sequences, or multiple sequences

Field.name: method
Field.Notes: string that either maps to another dataase, to capture workflows, or is a simple method name

Field.name: parameters
Field.Notes: hash that stores parameter values used in the alignment

Field.name: protocol
Field.Notes: human readable, how did you get here with these sequences? could also map to a separate table

Field.name: source-db
Field.Notes: for indicating the ID in the db where this alignment originated from

Field.name: source-db-id
Field.Notes: for indicating the ID in the db where this alignment originated from

Entity.name: AlignmentRowComponent
Entity.Notes: Individual components that make up rows in the alignment

Field.name: id
Field.Notes: will be unique kbase id: 'kb|ali.XXXXX.row.XXX'

Field.name: alignment-id
Field.Notes: needed for efficiency

Field.name: alignment-row
Field.Notes: number of row in the alignment, maybe needed for efficiency

Field.name: concatenation-order
Field.Notes: ordering starting from left to right in alignment row

Field.name: label
Field.Notes: text description copied from original fasta file

Field.name: sequence-id
Field.Notes: MD5 for protein, probably contigChunk for DNA/RNA

Field.name: kbase-id
Field.Notes: kbaseID for the sequence that was actually used in the alignment

Relationship.name: UsedToBuild
Relationship.Notes: This relationship connects Trees and the Multiple Sequence Alignments used to create them.

Relationship.name: IsComposedOf
Relationship.Notes: This relationship connects Trees and the Multiple Sequence Alignments used to create them.
